description: This file defines a utility class 'NetworkHelper' for managing HTTP requests in a Flutter/Dart application. It provides methods for sending HTTP requests with retries, handling environment variables, and extracting error messages from responses.

classes.name: NetworkHelper
classes.description: A utility class for performing HTTP requests with retry logic, environment variable management, and error handling.

methods.name: sendRequest
methods.description: Sends an HTTP request with specified method, headers, and body. Implements retries for socket and client exceptions, and supports authentication tokens.

methods.name: extractApiError
methods.description: Extracts a human-readable error message from an HTTP response.
